items.sentence: I don't want to know what you're thinking right now.
Tom drinks some wine, but never enough to get drunk.
I'm having a difficult time finding a place to live.
Tom has almost completely recovered from his injury.
Tom has been offered a job singing on a cruise ship.
Tom returned the books he'd borrowed to the library.
If the weather is good tomorrow, let's go on a hike.
Tom landed the helicopter near the wounded soldiers.
I think that Tom could manage to do that by himself.
